Welcome everyone! This is Spatial Data Science Lab (SDS-Lab) at [Department of Geography Education](https://geoedu.snu.ac.kr), Seoul National University.
We are developing web applications for geography education, primarily using [Shiny](https://shiny.posit.co/).
